divs: sighting detailsit was a clear summer night in 1967 and i was comming home from work in my car near kent wahington first i saw flashes of lite and herd thunder on the hill top to the east and then i saw a serch light in the night sky coming down, then the saucer appeared ,the light went out when the vehicle stoped moving, it first appeared transparent and then changed to metal, first dark red (mov) then mixed to solid silver and was the size of a car. it hovered 35 feet away from me 35 feet up in the air, no sound, no smoke,a single small white light began to move, travleing around the primeter edge of the disk. the craft began to move after 4 to 5 minutes, travleing south slowely picking up speed, i clocked it at 85 mph and after 1\4 mile the saucer turned west at a right angle and i followed it with my car, after one block the saucer turned north at a right angle again and it did not bank on the turns, i followed it for one block, stoped my car,and i turned off my engin. i got out and watched it disapear, it made no noise, however i felt it knew i was following it. i was a trained observer,u.s.army lrrp,i never used drugs,i was not drinking. it is my openion; "the saucer was not from this world and verry high technology". i reported the sighting to all the authorties, who did not believe me, including most of my friends and family and my boss. i have stood by my report for 40 years. i will swear to it to my grave. i was a structual test mechanic for the boeing aircraft co. at that time. i was qualifyed to work as a structual test mechanic on the sst and the 747 and a hydrolics specialest. my eye sight was 20\20 and my hearing was normal. i have never ben contacted by anyone about my report.
Summary: 35 feet away, 35 feet off the gruond, size of a car, no noise, one light on edge of disk circleng,
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Kent
There were no other sightings in Kent on or around May 31st 1967
